**TITLE (ENG)ǀ TITRE (FRA)**
Temporary Emergency Office Spaceǀ Espace de bureau en cas d’urgence

**TENDER REFERENCE (ENG)ǀ ID.CONTRAT (FRA)**
Reference: cb-5942-34212735ǀ ID. N° : cb-5942-34212735

**TENDER SCHEDULE**
* **Publication Date])** May 29, 2023ǀ 29 mai 2023
* **Tender Closing Date)** June 19, 2023, 14:00:00 ESTǀ 19 June 2023, 14 :00 h

**AWARD NOTICE**
Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)ǀ Type d’avis: Préavis d’attribution du contrat (PAC)

** BACKGROUND**
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) requires temporary emergency office space for up to 60 employees. The Office seeks service providers that can offer fully equipped office space available on short notice, typically under 24 hours, in major Canadian cities. The purpose of this tender is to provide other suppliers with the opportunity to demonstrate their capabilities to meet OSFI’s requirements.

**Requirements**
* Fully equipped office space capable of accommodating up to 60 employees
* Service providers must operate in major Canadian cities (or surrounding municipalities) where OSFI has office locations
* Emergency office space must be available on short notice (under 24 hours)

**INVOLVING GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENTS**
* Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (BSIF)
